node.title: Senior Android Developer
node.content:
Cosmic Development is looking for a Senior Android Developer to join our team to assist with the rapid growth of our client.

Your role will be:
● Develop and deliver high impact and quality, scalable code
● Provide technical expertise and contribute product ideas (new and existing)
● Perform code reviews and solve issues rapidly
● Debug, troubleshoot, and fix issues across multiple devices
● Overall, contribute our client’s goals and vision

Requirements:
● 5+ years of experience in Mobile Application Development using Java/Kotlin based Android (Native)
● Excellent understanding of OOP and it's main principals
● Experience with RxJava
● Experience with Android APIs and Capabilities
● Experience with RESTful APIs and JSON
● Experience with the latest API capabilities in Android 5.x+

Advantage will be given to candidates who have:
● Understanding of Android Design Principles
● Experience with Android APIs and Capabilities
● Familiarity with continuous integration
● Knowledge of common design patterns, frameworks, and libraries for mobile development

What do we offer?
● Competitive salary and career growth
● Work in a friendly, fun, multicultural, and fast-growing company
● A chance to work with the newest technology in the field
● Free courses and training programs
● Annual team building event and various team building activities

We have a lot to offer. To get an idea about our work environment, team spirit, and benefits, check our Career page or feel free to contact us.

node.title: Facebook Ads Manager
node.content:
Ready to take your Facebook Ads expertise to the next level? Join our team as a Facebook Ads Manager and turn clicks into conversions!

 
Your role will be: 
- Act as a consultant to develop and grow client relationships with advertisers of all sizes
- Help the team with the current projects, advertisements and promotion of products
- Preparing content, brochures and other materials for the client's campaigns
- Monitoring and optimizing campaign performance
- Communicating with client and the team on start and end dates
- Assisting the digital media sales team in other tasks related to the role
 
You will fit the role if you have: 
- 2+ years experience in account management / client services roles in digital marketing or ad tech experience with auction-based ad networks
- At least 2 years experience in e-marketing, Facebook Ads, Ad Ops, Facebook/Meta Ads and Lead generation
- A working understanding of Google Ads
- Demonstrated experience in managing and analyzing campaign delivery
- Strong understanding of the digital advertising, social media, and e-commerce landscape as well as related platforms
- Excellent organizational skills 
- Strong critical thinking, analytical, and problem-solving skills 
- Knowledge of sales funnels, landing pages, etc
- Flexibility and willingness to support the team in wide-ranging capacities  
Advantage will be given to candidates who have:
- Exceptional verbal and written communication skills Fluent in English
- Experience working effectively with cross-functional teams
- Avid listener of podcasts and various other types of digital content

What we offer: 
- Competitive salary and career growth
- Private health insurance for you and your family
- Annual budget for professional development 
- Free courses and training programs
- A chance to work with the newest technology in the field
- Monthly budget for additional perks
- Team buildings and other events

●    Strong understanding and vast experience of practical application of OOP concepts

node.title: Full Stack Engineer (PHP + JavaScript)
node.content:
We are looking for a passionate developer for our client, Bookmark!
The future of website creation and design is here! And we need you to be one of the creators.


Bookmark was founded in 2014 with one and only mission - to provide business owners with a quick website building experience. Bookmark is a website builder powered by Artificial Intelligence (AI), which empowers people to instantly create a remarkable website without any technical skills.
Bookmark’s Artificial Intelligence Design Assistant - AIDA - creates smart websites in less than two minutes by making selections from millions of different combinations that are previously created with the help of human creativity and machine learning technology. AIDA is the main guide in the process of editing content and design and eliminator of 90% of the pain points in building a website.

Do you have what it takes to help AIDA deliver easy website building experiences? If your answer is yes, continue reading the following requirements.

Your role will be:
● Developing and delivering high impact and quality, well tested, scalable code
● Identify problems and bugs, and solve issues rapidly
● Responsible for Backend architecture, design, development, and deployment of cloud-based features.
● Responsible for Frontend architecture, design, development, and deployment of cloud-based features.
● Overall, contribute to the product goals and vision
● Developing and delivering high impact and quality; well-tested and scalable code
● Identifying problems and bugs
● Performing code reviews and solving issues rapidly
● Debugging, troubleshooting and fixing issues across multiple browsers
● Contributing to the product goals and vision

Basic requirements:
● 5+ years of experience as Software Developer
● Strong knowledge of PHP
● Strong knowledge of JavaScript (ES5, ES6)
● Experience with HTML5, CSS3
● Experience with MySQL
● Experience with Linux Systems

Advantage will be given to candidates who meet some of the following requirements:
● Object-oriented mindset
● Deep understanding of SOLID principles
● Experience with popular PHP frameworks (Symfony, Laravel)
● Familiarity with reactive JS programming (Vue.js, React)
● Familiarity with implementing third-party services
● Familiarity with Linux system administration

What do we offer?

node.title: Site Reliability Engineer
node.content:
We are looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join our team to help assist with the rapid growth of our client.

If you are a hard-working, smart SRE who wants to work with a team, we want to hear from you. Our portfolio of products and services ranges from reporting and analytics to internal build and deployment automation to a proprietary RTB Ad server processing 100B+ requests per month in addition to processing terabytes of data. You will work on an RTB ad server MFX which processes 80 billion+ requests per month, and you will be responsible for setup, monitoring, optimizing, and maintaining various applications on AWS. Those interested in development will have the opportunity to write new features and tests as well. 

Responsibilities:
● Monitor and maintain existing applications
● Improve existing applications (eg. how can we improve response times, maximize CPU utilization to lower costs, or streamline processes?)
● Fix issues as they arise
● Assist other teams with deployments and feature additions
● Maintain constant communication with the team, and collaboration with others on new projects 
● Document the work done where needed
● Respond to queries from other teams

Requirements:
● 4+ years of experience with managing servers
● Experience with AWS and other Multi-Region Cloud Environment
● Experience with configuring and troubleshooting Linux servers and applications
● Experience configuring and supporting common applications (eg. php, php-fpm, nginx, git, composer, redis)  
● Familiarity with CI/CD skills and processes
● Automation with PHP, Python, Bash
● Ad tech experience is a big plus
● Experience with automating server deployments, alarm resolution, and/or load testing

● Competitive salary and career growth  
● Private health insurance

  • Take a lead role in the development of proposals and presentations for new business
  • Create and nurture existing partnership relationships
  • Attend industry events and conferences and recruit potential partners

Requirements:

  • 3+ years of business development experience in a related industry
  • Ability to navigate difficult relationships
  • Successful track record in B2B and B2C sales and negotiation
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • Innovative problem-solver with the ability to develop and propose product-based solutions for partners
  • Proficient in Microsoft Office applications and industry-specific analysis software
  • Proficient in Google Analytics and similar reporting and analytics tools
  • Experience with Zoho, Tune, CJ, Cake and other similar platforms preferred
  • Experience with SimilarWeb or other tools preferred

What do we offer?

  • Competitive salary and career growth
  • Work in a friendly, fun, multicultural, and fast-growing company
  • A chance to work with the newest technology in the field
  • Private Health insurance
  • Free courses and training programs

  • Working experience in Figma is mandatory
  • Experience with other tools and software
  • B2B self service UI design

Nice to have:

  • Familiarity with designing for Accessibility (ensuring that the product is accessible to people with disabilities and adheres to accessibility guidelines and standards, such as WCAG)
  • Be able to design modern net new materials

Your role will entail:

  • Structuring and organizing information in a logical and intuitive manner (may have used techniques like card sorting and sitemaps in the past) 
  • Wireframing and Prototyping: Creating low-fidelity wireframes and interactive prototypes to visualize the layout and functionality of a product
  • Designing the visual elements of the product, including color schemes, typography, and graphics, while adhering to branding guidelines
  • Defining how the user interacts with the product, including the design of buttons, menus, and navigation systems
  • Creating diagrams and flowcharts to illustrate the user's journey through the product

What we offer:

  • Competitive salary and career growth
  • Flexible work hours and remote work
  • Work in a friendly, fun, multicultural, and fast-growing company
  • A chance to work with the newest technology in the field
  • Access to online courses and training programs
  • Annual team building events and various team building activities
  • Private health insurance and life insurance
  • Monthly budget for additional perks (sports activities, wellness, literature, gadgets...)
  • Annual budgets for learning and development (hackathons, seminars, conferences, trainings...)

node.title: SOC Engineer
node.content:
We are looking for a SOC Engineer to join our team to help assist with the rapid growth of our client.

Requirements:

  • Minimum 3 years of experience as SOC Engineer or Cyber Security Analyst
  • Linux server experience is mandatory.
  • Excellent English speaking and writing skills.
  • Experience with working in a global SOC that provides 24/7 support.
  • Experience in working a SIEM (i.e. QRadar, LogRhythm, Splunk, Wazuh).
  • Experience with monitoring tools such as: Zabbix, Netflow, etc.
  • Experience running Ansible playbooks.
  • Knowledge of TCP Networking, HTTP, and Log analysis.
  • Ability to monitor, track, and analyze networks/systems/logs for potential incidents and respond in a timely manner.
  • Minimum level of knowledge of Network+/Security+ equivalent (cert not req, just equivalent knowledge).
  • Experience in using ticketing systems.

Nice to have:

  • Experience with JunOS firewalls.
  • Advanced Linux troubleshooting (i.e. tcpdump, memdump, nmap, apparmor, etc).
  • DevSecOps and Python.
  • QA Experience.
  • Incident response experience (real not tabletop).
  • Burp Suite, OWASP projects.

What we offer:

  • Competitive salary and career growth
  • Flexible work hours and remote work
  • Work in a friendly, fun, multicultural, and fast-growing company
  • A chance to work with the newest technology in the field
  • Access to online courses and training programs
  • Annual team building events and various team building activities
  • Private health insurance and life insurance
  • Monthly budget for additional perks (sports activities, wellness, literature, gadgets...)
  • Annual budgets for learning and development (hackathons, seminars, conferences, trainings...)

You will focus on delivering a delightful user experience using React and other modern front-
